item.title: About
item.author: amyw32@protonmail.com (Amy)
item.description: We started this website because we love technology. I have a PhD in Computer Science, and my partner is a Linux expert. Our mission is to bring you the how-to information you crave. That’s how our blog got its name! We want to be your authoritative source for tech “how-to” articles. Starting small is not a problem. When reviewing niches for blogs, we both realized that technology was our passion. We love what we do.
